attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: VAT is added to the price of fuel after the fuel duty is added hence we are paying VAT on a tax. As a tax is a burden and not a service or goods VAT should be added before the fuel duty. Because the government TAX US ON A TAX we pay about 9 pence more than we should for a litre of petrol, on a 50 litre tank that is £4.50 every time you fill up.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
